name: Kaiju Klimb
description:
Kaijus and Skyscrapers - Is there a more iconic duo?
Aid your Kaiju in rising to greater and greater heights in the world's tallest building, while dodging pesky obstacles that may threaten your ascent!

Kaiju Klimb was built in a Game Jam, performed by 7 beginners.
Their love for cute animals and world annihilation inspired those deary designers into developing a minimum viable product of what seems to be a sign of impending doom... Or they just love giant adorable monsters.

Heavily inspired in the monsters from The PowerPuff Girls, famous giant creatures like Godzilla, King Kong, and Mothra as well as mythology from countless cultures around the world, Kaiju Klimb evokes that addicting gameplay from simple games into a sweet casual style, perfectly setting the mood for the destruction of earth while you relax!

A bigger and better sequel to Kaiju Klimb is already in development, offering a continuous flow of update containing additional monsters, levels, catchy songs and new addictive ways to play!

However, just like every designer on earth... We are penniless! You could help us buying this humble app or if you are as miserable as we are, you can...

PLAY IT FOR FREE ON YOUR PHONE!
with ads of course
